SEARCH
Package hms.boundary.administrator.ManageStaff

Class ManageStaffView

java.lang.Object
hms.boundary.View
hms.boundary.administrator.ManageStaff.ManageStaffView
public class ManageStaffView extends View
The ManageStaffView class handles the user interface for managing hospital staff. It displays the options available to the administrator for adding, updating, removing, and viewing staff, as well as returning to the main menu.

  • Constructor Details

    • ManageStaffView

  • Method Details

    • displayHeader

      public void displayHeader()
      Displays the header for the Manage Hospital Staff view. It provides a bordered text representation with the title "Manage Hospital Staff".
      Specified by:
      displayHeader in class View

    • displayOptions

      public void displayOptions()
      Displays the options available to the administrator for managing staff. The options include adding staff, updating staff, removing staff, displaying all staff, or returning to the main menu.

    • displayRemoveSuccess

      public void displayRemoveSuccess()
      Displays a success message indicating that a user has been successfully removed.

    • displayUserNotFound

      public void displayUserNotFound()
      Displays an error message indicating that the user was not found.

    • getChoice

      public int getChoice()
      Retrieves an integer choice from the user from the menu and returns the choice. The valid choices are between 1 and 5, corresponding to the available options.
      Returns:
      the user's choice as an integer. If invalid input is provided, returns -1.

    • printExit

      public void printExit()
      Prints a message indicating that the system is returning to the main menu.
